GSD.description:
nilfs2: fix use-after-free bug of struct nilfs_root

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.331 by commit a9043a24c6e340d45b204d294a25044726fd2770. For more details please see the references link.
